name: Pineapple: A Bittersweet Revenge
storyline:
Imagine arriving at a new school, only to be harassed by someone we'll call "the witch". For three long months, the witch makes your life a living hell. She torments you and a few others relentlessly. Until one day, you decide to put an end to it. Then… you buy a pineapple.

PINEAPPLE unfolds the tale of a bittersweet revenge. You’ll orchestrate some clever pranks, strategically placing pineapples in the bully's most unexpected and intimate spaces, until she learns her lesson. But beware: she won’t be the only one in for a surprise.

An unconventional gaming adventure, PINEAPPLE combines a humorous storyline with fun challenges for an engaging experience. This short yet relevant and impactful interactive tale weaves amusement, ease, and wit, unfolding a rib-tickling story about the quirks of bullying.
summary: Pineapple is a puzzle and story-revenge-driven game where you become the hero of the school by pulling pranks on the top bully. Time to give that witch a taste of their own medicine. With a pineapple.
